channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV SLO and Dnevnik, 12–14 August 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 2–3 seats
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (RE): 3–4 seats
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 1–2 seats
  • Stranka modernega centra (RE): 0 seats
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 0–1 seats
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 0 seats
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (RE): 0 seats
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 0 seats
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 0 seats
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV SLO and Dnevnik, 12–14 August 2019 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Ninamedia for RTV SLO and Dnevnik, 12–14 August 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka (EPP): 20.0–26.3%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca (RE): 29.5–36.4%
  • Socialni demokrati (S&D): 12.4–17.7%
  • Stranka modernega centra (RE): 0.3–1.7%
  • Levica (GUE/NGL): 7.2–11.5%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati (EPP): 3.9–7.2%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek (RE): 2.4–5.2%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije (RE): 3.5–6.7%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka (NI): 1.7–4.2%
  • Slovenska ljudska stranka (EPP): 1.4–3.7%
